title: I cant get into game
body: Well I love this game, But I cant play it. I can select my champion and move freely throughout the client however, The loading screen wont come up. After champ select ends the client pops up and says reconnect as if I dc from game. I click reconnect and literally nothing happens. I have done a bug report and have not gotten a response. I don't know if this is just my pc or connection and if it is I would love some advice on how to fix the problem.

replies.body:
Hey Freos,

We've released a temporary build that may fix the issue for you, give it a try: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/GX3Zhxwe-game-client-anti-cheat-known-issues-and-fixes

I also added you in-game to help you triage any problems you are experiencing. Sorry for the troubles!
Was there ever a fix to this exact problem? I am experiencing it and have tried literally everything. The ticket I entered has done nothing to help!
